name: The Before Times
description:
Descend out of the darkness in our first-person atmospheric game.

Controls

  • WASD/arrows to move.
  • Mouse to control camera.
  • E/left-click to interact with things.

Our team

  • Levi Lindsey - Developer - levi.dev
  • Audrey Meyer - Art/VFX - artstation.com/ochopika
  • Wesley Meyer - Music - soundcloud.app.goo.gl/2JUNKojfec3rW3LM7
  • Ross Sauby - Designer - rosssauby.com
  • Marjie Volk - Developer
  • Steven Weiss - Developer
